lines: 1. Yesu Kristo osechier, Alleluya!Dhano, Malaika wer, Alleluya!Wer mar mor kod wend locho, Alleluya!Polo wer be piny duoko, Alleluya!
2. Ruoth Maduong` ngima koro, Alleluya!Ere lit ma tho kelo? Alleluya!Ne otho mond` owarwa, Alleluya!Ere loch ma liel nigo? Alleluya!
3. Hera okelo warruok, Alleluya!Oseloyo lweny mager, Alleluya!Tho to ok nyal geng`e ngang`, Alleluya!Kristo oseyaw kar dak, Alleluyah!
4. Wanalu ndach Ruoth Yesu, Alleluya!Kawadhi bang` Jatendwa, Alleluya!Kwasedoko kaka En, Alleluya!Msalaba, liel, polo, Alleluya!
